name: Suburb Jogging Simulator
description:
Created in 48 hours for the ludum dare 40 compo!
The theme was "The more you have, the worse it is".

You start out as a lone jogger who has some trouble jumping over pits. (why are there pits everywhere anyway?!). When other suburbians see you shedding those pounds, they naturally don't want do any worse, but they all rely on you to avoid those pits.
